Name: Inside Her (bedroom)
About the game: By using the keyboard's arrows, Move two mirrored characters to Get the items around the floor. Each monster girl has a Unique Skill like moving through walls, pushing items, etc. Solve the puzzles to increase their desire and, at the end of their challenge, get a hot uncensored sex scene. Features 6 Hot Monsters Girls with unique mechanics; 60 Levels; Animated CGs; 66 Steam Achievements;
